text:
Hi everyone.
We have set up Landing Pages in our HubSpot account (Marketing -> WebSite -> Landing Page). It has tracking code script inside and it's ID is the same as our account ID. Contact form in the landing page correctly adds contact to the CMS.
The problem I have is that the only cookie in the browser is `__hs_opt_out` , and I'd for sure want at least the `HubSpotutk` .
Also, the said Landing Page does not seem to count the visitors correctly, there are no page views recorded since two weeks ago.

Does anyone at least have a hint of what did we miss in setting up?

Hi HubSpotter.  Recently made redundant, I'm starting a solo agency to help myself and people like me to thrive - by helping businesses to grow at minimum cost.  I need your superpower (super intelligence) to learn how to build a funnel-oriented website.
